name: Progati Sangha of Dara
briefDescription: Education, E-learning/E-Literacy Program and computer centre, Sanitation & Hygiene, Drinking Water, Construction of Toilets in Schools under Swachh Bharat Mission, Excavation of Ponds for Livelihood Program,Women Empowerment, Vocational & Skill Development Training,Poverty Eradication Program, etc.
